name: ametrine.host
description: Hosting service providing various virtual hosting solutions at an affordable price.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist&&mkdir dist&&cp -r src/* dist&&echo '[amethyst-build] building (linux)'&&npx tsc -p .
scripts.sql: echo '[amethyst-db] merging sql files'&&sqlite3 data/db/database.db < dist/sql/init.sql
scripts.mb: echo 'move billing from dist to src'&&rm -rf src/modules/views/billing&&mkdir src/modules/views/billing&&cp -r dist/modules/views/billing/* src/modules/views/billing
scripts.ls: npm run build && npm run nstart
